citation.article-title: Description of 'Synergistetes' phyl. nov. and emended description of the phylum 'Deferribacteres' and of the family Syntrophomonadaceae, phylum 'Firmicutes'.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Synergistia (Syn.er.gis′ti.a. N.L. n. Synergistes type genus of the type order of the class; suff. -ia ending proposed by Gibbons and Murray and by Stackebrandt et al. to denote a class; N.L. fem. pl. n. Synergistia the Synergistales class).
The description is the same as that for the phylum Synergistetes.
